reviews.text: Still irks me how close they put the fence to the hot tub leaving no walking room.  The fence is very good and has prevented any unwanted child or pet access to the pool area.  The workers and the owner thought this looked okay.  Everyone that sees it remarks at how ridiculous it was done, when it could have easily split the difference for walking room on both sides.

We could not have been happier with Fence Fanatics!! They were so easy to work with, gave us a quick and accurate quote, and made sure the finished product was exactly what we needed. We wanted an easy, removable safety option around our pool to help keep the littles safe. We worked together to come up with the perfect solution that still left the pool accessible and usable without taking up too much of our outside space.

We had an outstanding experience with Fence Fanatics starting with the consultation with Alex all the way through the crew coming out to complete the job. We were kept informed about permit status, weather conditions, and the final project was absolutely beautiful. Everyone was kind and professional and their bid also beat out the compition. I have already sent a few recomendations out to family and friends but wanted to spread the word about this company as much as I could. Their workmanship an

Carl Goodman lives in my neighorhood and he came to give me an estimate when I was looking to replace my old fence.  He's very pleasant to work with.  All paperworks and payment were done electronically which suits me perfectly.  The installation of the fence was done weeks ahead of schedule which was great.  The fence was installed efficiently.  The Fence Fanatics staff were great to work with and went about their installation job timely.  The end result was excellent.  Will highly recomment Fe

Fence Fanatics did an outstanding job on our repair project. From our initial inquiry to finished product they were quick, professional, affordable. Definitely your go-to contact for any fencing need.

In a world where great contractors are now hard to find.. Fence Fanatics is phenomenal. Great communication, great folks who did rhe work, and great end result.  Loved the whole process beginning to finish.  Thank you guys again for the work.  Carl is a great asset to the team and customer satisfaction.

We used Fence Fanatics to repair the retaining wall on our property. The team was a pleasure to work with! Carl did a fabulous job with our proposal process and was responsive to questions (even over the weekend). He was always in contact with us for updates on timing and next steps. The team was always on time for work and went above and beyond. The property was left tidy and the teams worked very hard. Additionally, the manager came by the property often to check on progress and give us update

We recently had part of our fence blow over due to wind. We've had this happen before and another fence company didn't do the best job. This time around, Fence Fanatics came out and fixed it! It is much sturdier before. Great communication and VERY prompt. We had someone out within two hours to assess. Carl was also very helpful and kind! Would recommend

Called them to do fence repairs which states on the website they will do along with the North Dallas Quality Home Service Guide. However the lady on the phone said they are not doing fence repairs. Don’t state services on your website if you can’t uphold them. How can anyone trust them to do a good job if they can’t uphold the services they list that they provide? There are other companies that will do what their sites state!!!

Your website might not mention it now. But I reached out to North D

The gentleman was professional, expedient and clearly knew exactly what was necessary to fix our fence gates. He came within thirty minutes of our call.  Not only that, he provided the service free of charge, I wanted to cry because it seems like most businesses these days do the very least they can while charging exorbitant prices. I am highly impressed and would definitely use them for future needs and refer them to friends and neighbors. Kindness and compassion are still alive! Thank you so m

We recently used Fence Fanatics to replace an old ugly fence on all three sides of our home with a 8’ privacy fence, a mesh pool fence, and an iron fence to block off the drive way. This is the second time I have used them and both experiences have been great. The sales representative was professional, on time, and updated regularly. They completed all fences on time and they look great. They also conducted a walk through and fixed things we pointed out. Highly recommend them.
Very good workers, did quality work, as agreed, would certainly use again, ha, won’t need a fence again, but you may, an fence fanatics is a good reliable company you can trust !

I used Fence Fanatics for a gate around my pool. Nick and his crew were great to work with and did a solid job on my gate. I got quotes from others for this type of gate and chose Fence Fanatics because of their great price and their quick installation. Would absolutely use them again in the future. Highly recommend.

Needed a good section of fencing replaced, reached out for a quote. Responded quickly, came out and provided a reasonable price. Very professional, very responsive and showed up everyday and worked from 8am to 5pm until the job was done. I was happy and the buyer was happy. Highly recommend.
Fence Fanatic just completed replacing my 250 foot fence and a pergola over the patio.  The work was first class in every respect.  Thanks to Edwin, Lane, Carl and Brendon for a job well done.

Nick and his crew did a great job.  They were quick to respond, professional, courteous and they did a great job in cleaning up worn they were done.  I highly recommend them. It was a pleasure doing business with them.

I had an awesome experience from Fence Fanatics. My iron iron gate stopped opening during the weekend and when I called Fence Fenatics I got an immediate response and within 20 minutes they sent their repair person and fixed my gate. Very professional and responsive. I would definitely hire them again next time.

Fence Fanatics has helped us out with a couple of projects and I could not recommend them enough! Nick and his team are very professional, reliable, and prompt to respond. They are very precise and pay attention to detail. You will not be disappointed in using them for your fencing needs!!

Great service and communication. They were very accommodating due to my house backing up to a business and they were unreasonable with the installation date. Fence fanatics were great and got the job done. Highly recommend.

What a great company! I am recommending them above any other company I've used in the past. They were speedy giving us a quote to remove a very long old fence to put in a new one.  I had another fence restained which makes it look like new (it's the  neighbor's fence). The prices were very fair. I was even surprised the new fence was put in on time, because a few days prior we had terrible wind storms which resulted in a lot of people losing their fences.  But they were there as scheduled.

They were very efficient and transparent, on top of their great work which I expected from my research of the company. They provided me with clear expectations that have been either met or exceeded. I would highly recommend them for any fencing needs, and I intend to use them in the future if needed.
Fabulous company! Fence Fanatics is extremely efficient, responsive and wonderful to work with. The attention to detail is unlike any other and I will definitely be recommending them in the future.

I am extremely pleased with the work done by Nick & his crew. They built a BEAUTIFUL fence in a timely manner and were nothing but professional the whole way through. Even when there was a snag and work had to be delayed, they stayed right on top of it so we could move forward as quickly and efficiently as possible. Every person who came to our home for this job was kind, helpful and courteous. I am so deeply thankful that a Facebook recommendation when I was in a pinch turned out to be such a g
Nick and the Fence Fanatics team are amazing! I reached out with some fence repair needs, and they were responsive, polite and real top notch!  I highly recommend them!

I've used fence fanatics several times and it has been quick and easy every time.  They respond promptly and got the work done quickly as well as doing a very good job.  I highly recommend giving them a call.

Carl and his team are absolutely a credit to Fence
Fanatics.  I am very proud of how it looks and to the value it ads to my property.

Terrific company with affordable prices and great customer service! Projects have been ontime and on budget with frequent updates. Angela has been a great help and is always knowledgeable and patient!
GREAT COMPANY. Service was timely and the fence they put up is high quality. Very pleased. Nick was responsive to any of my questions and I felt like they listened to exactly what I wanted done.
Outstanding experience.  Very friendly.  Very responsive, but not pushy.  Stayed on schedule and within budget and delivered quality workmanship.  Highly recommend.
Great workmanship and people! Thanks for a job well done. When it’s time for a new fence, I’ll call Fence Fanatics for sure!
Nick at fence fanatics is very knowledgeable when it comes to anything exterior like fencing,concrete, amd turf. Also, great reasonable prices 🫡 I definitely recommend! …
Pleasure to work with Fence Fanatics and team. Gave us a beautiful fence. Highly recommend
These guys did a great job. The fence is well built and it was completed in a timely fashion at a reasonable price. Can’t ask for anything more than that.
Pleasure to work with from start to finish. Product & service exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend.
Fence fanatics did an amazing job.  Will definitely refer family and friends!
My neighbor hired them to build and stain his new fence, but allowed me to have my side stained with a different color than his side. It looks GREAT!!!
Beautiful work done when they said they would do it and even before!  Can’t recommend this company enough for any fencing need.
Nick is very conscientious. I completely trusted him to take care of everything. He won’t let you down!
They replaced our fence and built a large gate. Excellent work and very responsive.  Would use again in the future.
I highly recommend Fence Fanatics for all of your fencing needs. They are timely, professional and clearly dedicated to their craft!
Enjoyed working with the guys. Quality work and good service.
100% look no further than Fence Fanatics. They’re professional, reliable and install exceptional quality fencing!
amazing family oriented company. can’t speak highly enough
Fence Fanatics did a great job replacing our backyard fence.
I asked if they could repair my fence, and was told they only repair fences they installed.
Responsiveness, Professionalism
Responsiveness, Professionalism

Tim Knapp, thank you so much! Please let us know if you need anything else. 

Fence Fanatics
